title: Announcement Generator
original_prompt: I want you to write 3 concise yet informative press release headline for a {topic:school holiday break from April 9th to May 1st } announcement.
input1: "Exciting School Holiday Break: Students Enjoy a Well-Deserved Break from April 9th to May 1st!"
input2: "Mark Your Calendars: School Holiday Break Scheduled from April 9th to May 1st for All Students!"
input1_ans:
1. "Mark Your Calendars: School Holiday Break Scheduled from April 9th to May 1st!"
2. "Spring into Fun: Students to Enjoy Extended Holiday Break from April 9th to May 1st!"
3. "Attention Parents: School Holiday Break Announced for April 9th to May 1st!"

Here are three concise and informative headlines for the school holiday break announcement:

1. "School Holiday Break: Students Rejuvenate from April 9th to May 1st!"
2. "Mark Your Calendars: School Holiday Break Runs April 9th to May 1st!"
3. "Enjoy the Break: School Holiday from April 9th to May 1st!"
input2_ans:
1. "Attention Parents: School Holiday Break Set for April 9th to May 1st – Plan Ahead!"
2. "Spring Break Alert: Students Enjoy a Well-Deserved Holiday from April 9th to May 1st!"
3. "Save the Date: School Holiday Break Announced for April 9th to May 1st – No Classes!"

Here are three concise and informative headlines for the school holiday break announcement:

1. "School Holiday Break: April 9th to May 1st - Enjoy Your Time Off!"
2. "Attention Students: School Closed for Holiday Break from April 9th to May 1st!"
3. "Plan Ahead: School Holiday Break Announced for April 9th to May 1st!"
